author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g
false_positives: False positives are expected (e.g. in environments where WinRM is used legitimately)
name: WmiPrvSE Spawned A Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\WmiPrvSe.exe" AND (NOT ((LogonId:("0x3e7" OR "null")) OR (user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*)) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WmiPrvSE.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WerFault.exe") OR (NOT _exists_:LogonId))))
